com.viaoa.util

Class SimpleXMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • com.viaoa.util.SimpleXMLReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class SimpleXMLReader
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    XMLReader using a SAXParser to parse and load into a hierarchy of name/value, where value is a hashmap or an ArrayList of values or hashmaps. NOTE: all name/values are put in uppercase see: SimpleXMLReaderTest
